temp: Index, Call Point, Message, ReceivedTime, Status, StatusTime, ExportedTime, Recipient, System ID

name: Export All
template:
SELECT 
`index` AS 'Index',
`sender` AS 'Call Point',
`content` AS 'Message',
`rxTime`,
`status` AS 'Status',
`statusTime`,
`exported`,
`pagerNumber` AS 'Recipient',
`sysID` AS 'System ID'
FROM `log`
ORDER BY  `rxTime` DESC;

rules.to: Attached is the requested information from your CaptureCall system.

name: Export New
template:
SELECT
`index` AS 'Index',
`sender` AS 'Call Point',
`content` AS 'Message',
`rxTime`,
`status` AS 'Status',
`statusTime`,
`exported`,
`pagerNumber` AS 'Recipient',
`sysID` AS 'System ID'
FROM `log` WHERE `exported` IS NULL
UPDATE `log` SET `exported`= '{{timestamp}}'

rules.to: Please Enter a Valid eMail Address

temp: Index, Call Point, Message, ReceivedTime, Status, StatusTime, ExportedTime, Recipient, System ID

rules.to: Attached is the requested information from your CaptureCall system.

name: Export New
template:
SELECT
`index` AS 'Index',
`sender` AS 'Call Point',
`content` AS 'Message',
`rxTime`,
`status` AS 'Status',
`statusTime`,
`exported`,
`pagerNumber` AS 'Recipient',
`sysID` AS 'System ID'
FROM `log` WHERE `exported` IS NULL

name: Make Table
topic: CREATE TABLE `log` ( 	`index`	INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 	`capcode`	INTEGER, 	`pagerNumber`	INTEGER, 	`sysID`	INTEGER, 	`content`	TEXT, 	`msgPart1`	TEXT, 	`msgPart2`	TEXT, 	`sender`	TEXT, 	`rxTime`	INTEGER, 	`status`	TEXT, 	`statusTime`	INTEGER, 	`exported`	INTEGER );

name: Select Active Data
template:
SELECT `index`, `pagerNumber`, `sysID`, `content`, `msgPart1`, `msgPart2`, `sender`, `rxTime`, `status`
FROM `log`
WHERE  `status` = 'Active' OR `status` = 'Late'
ORDER BY  `rxTime` DESC

ORDER BY  `rxTime` DESC;

Clear Old Records
topic: DELETE FROM `log` WHERE `index` IN (SELECT `index` FROM `log` ORDER BY `index` DESC LIMIT -1 OFFSET 2000) AND `exported` IS NOT NULL;

name: Clear Old Records
template: DELETE FROM `log` WHERE `index` IN (SELECT `index` FROM `log` ORDER BY `index` DESC LIMIT -1 OFFSET 2000) AND `exported` IS NOT NULL;

template: INSERT INTO `log` ('capcode', 'pagerNumber', 'sysID', 'content', 'msgPart1', 'msgPart2', 'sender', 'rxTime', 'status', 'statusTime') VALUES ('{{capcode}}', '{{pagerNumber}}', '{{sysID}}', '{{content}}', '{{msgPart1}}', '{{msgPart2}}', '{{sender}}','{{timestamp}}', 'Active', '{{timestamp}}');

name: Add Msg to DB as Late
template: INSERT INTO `log` ('capcode', 'pagerNumber', 'sysID', 'content', 'msgPart1', 'msgPart2', 'sender', 'rxTime', 'status', 'statusTime') VALUES ('{{capcode}}', '{{pagerNumber}}', '{{sysID}}', '{{content}}', '{{msgPart1}}', '{{msgPart2}}', '{{sender}}','{{timestamp}}', 'Late', '{{timestamp}}');

name: Add Msg to DB as Handled
template: INSERT INTO `log` ('capcode', 'pagerNumber', 'sysID', 'content', 'msgPart1', 'msgPart2', 'sender', 'rxTime', 'status', 'statusTime') VALUES ('{{capcode}}', '{{pagerNumber}}', '{{sysID}}', '{{content}}', '{{msgPart1}}', '{{msgPart2}}', '{{sender}}','{{timestamp}}', 'Attended', '{{timestamp}}');

name: Update Active to Handled
template: UPDATE `log` SET status = 'Handled', statusTime = '{{timestamp}}' WHERE `sender` = {{sender}} AND `status` = 'Active';

name: Update Late to Handled
template: UPDATE `log` SET status = 'Handled', statusTime = '{{timestamp}}' WHERE `sender` = {{sender}} AND `status` = 'Late';
